languages.text: "Ирлиэт прямо виновна в том, что мы угодили в ловушку ее собрата. Они сговорились против нас, и то, что одна из них сама стала добычей своего родственника, говорит лишь о том, сколь подлыми и жестокими существами они являются по своей природе. Что бы она не наплела тебе, {name}, верить этому — вершина наивности".

traits.locale_text: "Ирлиэт прямо виновна в том, что мы угодили в ловушку ее собрата. Они сговорились против нас, и то, что одна из них сама стала добычей своего родственника, говорит лишь о том, сколь подлыми и жестокими существами они являются по своей природе. Что бы она не наплела тебе, {name}, верить этому — вершина наивности".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Yrliet is directly responsible for us being lured into her kin's trap. They plotted against us together. That she herself ended up a captive only shows how nefarious and brutal these creatures are by their very nature. Whatever story she spun you, {name}, it was the height of naivety to believe it."
languages.original_text: "Ирлиэт прямо виновна в том, что мы угодили в ловушку ее собрата. Они сговорились против нас, и то, что одна из них сама стала добычей своего родственника, говорит лишь о том, сколь подлыми и жестокими существами они являются по своей природе. Что бы она не наплела тебе, {name}, верить этому — вершина наивности".

That she herself ended up a captive only shows how nefarious and brutal these creatures are by their very nature. Whatever story she spun you, {name}, it was the height of naivety to believe it."

That she herself ended up a captive only shows how nefarious and brutal these creatures are by their very nature. Whatever story she spun you, {name}, it was the height of naivety to believe it."

traits.locale_text: "Yrliet is directly responsible for us being lured into her kin's trap. They plotted against us together. That she herself ended up a captive only shows how nefarious and brutal these creatures are by their very nature. Whatever story she spun you, {name}, it was the height of naivety to believe it."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Yrliet is directly responsible for us being lured into her kin's trap. They plotted against us together. That she herself ended up a captive only shows how nefarious and brutal these creatures are by their very nature. Whatever story she spun you, {name}, it was the height of naivety to believe it."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “我们被引诱到了伊莉耶特亲族的陷阱之中，伊莉耶特对此负有直接责任。她和她的亲族一起密谋对付我们，而她自己最终也沦为了俘虏。这只能说明，这种生物的天性充满了邪恶与残忍。虽然我不知道她对你说了什么样的故事，{name}，但你相信了那些话，这实在是太天真了。”
languages.original_text: "Yrliet is directly responsible for us being lured into her kin's trap. They plotted against us together. That she herself ended up a captive only shows how nefarious and brutal these creatures are by their very nature. Whatever story she spun you, {name}, it was the height of naivety to believe it."

traits.locale_text: “我们被引诱到了伊莉耶特亲族的陷阱之中，伊莉耶特对此负有直接责任。她和她的亲族一起密谋对付我们，而她自己最终也沦为了俘虏。这只能说明，这种生物的天性充满了邪恶与残忍。虽然我不知道她对你说了什么样的故事，{name}，但你相信了那些话，这实在是太天真了。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: "Yrliet is directly responsible for us being lured into her kin's trap. They plotted against us together. That she herself ended up a captive only shows how nefarious and brutal these creatures are by their very nature. Whatever story she spun you, , it was the height of naivety to believe it."

languages.text: «Yrliet es directamente responsable por habernos llevado hasta la trampa de su gente. Conspiraron contra nosotros en conjunto. Que ella también haya acabado cautiva solo demuestra la maldad y brutalidad natas de estas criaturas. No importa qué historia haya hilado para usted, {name}, fue increíblemente ingenuo por su parte creerla».
languages.original_text: "Yrliet is directly responsible for us being lured into her kin's trap. They plotted against us together. That she herself ended up a captive only shows how nefarious and brutal these creatures are by their very nature. Whatever story she spun you, {name}, it was the height of naivety to believe it."

traits.locale_text: «Yrliet es directamente responsable por habernos llevado hasta la trampa de su gente. Conspiraron contra nosotros en conjunto. Que ella también haya acabado cautiva solo demuestra la maldad y brutalidad natas de estas criaturas. No importa qué historia haya hilado para usted, {name}, fue increíblemente ingenuo por su parte creerla».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「我々はユリエットのせいで、その血族の罠にはまった。彼らは共に、我々に対する陰謀を企てたのだ。彼女自身が虜囚になったことは、この生き物がいかに極悪非道で残忍な性質を持っているかを示しているに過ぎない。彼女がどんな話をしたにせよ、それを信じるのは世間知らずの極みといえるだろう、{name}」
languages.original_text: "Yrliet is directly responsible for us being lured into her kin's trap. They plotted against us together. That she herself ended up a captive only shows how nefarious and brutal these creatures are by their very nature. Whatever story she spun you, {name}, it was the height of naivety to believe it."

traits.locale_text: 「我々はユリエットのせいで、その血族の罠にはまった。彼らは共に、我々に対する陰謀を企てたのだ。彼女自身が虜囚になったことは、この生き物がいかに極悪非道で残忍な性質を持っているかを示しているに過ぎない。彼女がどんな話をしたにせよ、それを信じるのは世間知らずの極みといえるだろう、{name}」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Yrliet ist direkt dafür verantwortlich, uns in die Falle ihrer Verwandtschaft gelockt zu haben. Sie haben sich gemeinsam gegen uns verschworen. Dass sie selbst in Gefangenschaft geraten ist, zeigt nur, wie ruchlos und brutal diese Kreaturen von Natur aus. Welche Geschichte sie Euch auch aufgetischt hat, {name}, es war der Gipfel der Naivität, sie zu glauben."
languages.original_text: "Yrliet is directly responsible for us being lured into her kin's trap. They plotted against us together. That she herself ended up a captive only shows how nefarious and brutal these creatures are by their very nature. Whatever story she spun you, {name}, it was the height of naivety to believe it."

traits.locale_text: "Yrliet ist direkt dafür verantwortlich, uns in die Falle ihrer Verwandtschaft gelockt zu haben. Sie haben sich gemeinsam gegen uns verschworen. Dass sie selbst in Gefangenschaft geraten ist, zeigt nur, wie ruchlos und brutal diese Kreaturen von Natur aus. Welche Geschichte sie Euch auch aufgetischt hat, {name}, es war der Gipfel der Naivität, sie zu glauben."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « C'est à cause d'Yrliet que nous sommes tombés dans le piège de ses semblables. Ils ont comploté contre nous, c'est évident, et le fait qu'elle a elle aussi été faite prisonnière ne l'innocente en rien. Au contraire, cela ne fait qu'attester que ces créatures sont malfaisantes et cruelles par nature. Quoi qu'elle vous ait raconté, {name}, vous avez été extrêmement {mf|naïf|naïve} de la croire. »
languages.original_text: "Yrliet is directly responsible for us being lured into her kin's trap. They plotted against us together. That she herself ended up a captive only shows how nefarious and brutal these creatures are by their very nature. Whatever story she spun you, {name}, it was the height of naivety to believe it."

traits.locale_text: « C'est à cause d'Yrliet que nous sommes tombés dans le piège de ses semblables. Ils ont comploté contre nous, c'est évident, et le fait qu'elle a elle aussi été faite prisonnière ne l'innocente en rien. Au contraire, cela ne fait qu'attester que ces créatures sont malfaisantes et cruelles par nature. Quoi qu'elle vous ait raconté, {name}, vous avez été extrêmement {mf|naïf|naïve} de la croire. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Hısımlarının tuzağına Yrliet yüzünden düşmedik mi? Hepsini birlikte planlamışlar. Hoş, şimdi onu da tutsak ettiler... Buradan da bu yaratıkların ne denli menfur, vahşi tabiatlı olduğunu görüyoruz. Ne söyledi de kandın bilmiyorum {name} ama saflığın daniskası, onu biliyorum."
languages.original_text: "Yrliet is directly responsible for us being lured into her kin's trap. They plotted against us together. That she herself ended up a captive only shows how nefarious and brutal these creatures are by their very nature. Whatever story she spun you, {name}, it was the height of naivety to believe it."

traits.locale_text: "Hısımlarının tuzağına Yrliet yüzünden düşmedik mi? Hepsini birlikte planlamışlar. Hoş, şimdi onu da tutsak ettiler... Buradan da bu yaratıkların ne denli menfur, vahşi tabiatlı olduğunu görüyoruz. Ne söyledi de kandın, bilmiyorum {name} ama saflığın daniskası, onu biliyorum."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
